com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx
Class DefaultCustomizer

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.properties.PropertiesProvider<Application>
      com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx.JmxConnectionCustomizer
          com.sun.tools.visualvm.jmx.DefaultCustomizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Positionable
public class DefaultCustomizer
extends JmxConnectionCustomizer

JmxConnectionCustomizer providing the default JMX Connection dialog to enter JMX connection url and optional credentials.

Since:
VisualVM 1.2
Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

Nested Class Summary
static class DefaultCustomizer.CustomizerUI
          Implementation of PropertiesPanel for entering the JMX url, optional credentials and selecting whether the credentials should be persistent or transient.
static class DefaultCustomizer.PropertiesUI
          Implementation of PropertiesPanel for viewing the JMX connection properties defined when creating the connection.

public boolean providesProperties(Application application)
Description copied from class: JmxConnectionCustomizer

Returns:

createPanel

public PropertiesPanel createPanel(Application application)
Description copied from class: PropertiesProvider
Returns a PropertiesPanel instance to create or edit the properties. If the provided DataSource is null it means that the DataSource is being created and the properites will define the initial state. Otherwise the DataSource properties are being edited. Note: if using custom JPanel instances in the PropertiesPanel be sure to use JPanel.setOpaque(false) whenever possible to keep the settings UI consistent. For some Look and Feels the PropertiesPanel container doesn't have a standard JPanel background.

Specified by:
createPanel in class PropertiesProvider<Application>
Parameters:
application - DataSource to edit the properties or null
Returns:
PropertiesPanel instance to create or edit the properties

getConnectionSetup

public JmxConnectionCustomizer.Setup getConnectionSetup(PropertiesPanel customizerPanel)
Description copied from class: JmxConnectionCustomizer
Returns the Setup defining the JMX connection to be created.

Specified by:
getConnectionSetup in class JmxConnectionCustomizer
Parameters:
customizerPanel - PropertiesPanel with the user-defined settings
Returns:
Setup defining the JMX connection to be created

isValidConnectionString

protected static boolean isValidConnectionString(String jmxurl)
Returns true if the provided string represents a valid JMX url, false otherwise.

Parameters:
txt - JMX url to be checked
Returns:
true if the provided string represents a valid JMX url, false otherwise
